title: Quantum Mechanics and Basic Spectroscopy
description: A detailed introduction to quantum theory and the application of wave mechanics to problems of atomic structure, bonding in molecules, and fundamentals of spectroscopy. Students cannot receive credit for this course and BIOC 163A.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): CHEM 1B and CHEM 1C, or CHEM 3C, or CHEM 4B; PHYS 5A, PHYS 5B, and PHYS 5C or PHYS 6A, PHYS  6B, and PHYS 6C; and MATH 22 or MATH 23B. PHYS 6C can be taken concurrently.

class_notes: Enroll in lecture and associated discussion section
